com.tome25.utils.lib

Class JarExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tome25.utils.lib.JarExtractor

  • public class JarExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can extract files from jar archives. You will need to copy this class and LibraryLoader into your project in order to extract and add this library to the classpath if you packaged it into your main jar.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JarExtractor()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void extractFileFromJar(java.io.File jarFile, java.lang.String fileName)
      Extracts the file with the given name from the directory if the name contains the directory names, or all files with that name if it doesn't.

      Extracts the file with the given name from the directory if the name contains the directory names, or all files with that name if it doesn't.

      static void extractLibsFromJar(java.io.File jarFile)
      Extracts all jar files from jarFile, as they are potentially libraries, into the libs directory next to this jar file.
      static void extractLibsFromJar(java.io.File jarFile, java.io.File outputDir)
      Extracts all jar files from jarFile, as they are potentially libraries, into the libs directory next to this jar file.

      Extracts all jar files from jarFile, as they are potentially libraries, into the libs directory next to this jar file.
      static void extractThis(java.io.File jarFile)
      Extracts the ToMe25s-Java-Utilites.jar from jarFile, if it exists, and puts it into the libs directory next to this jar.
      static void extractThis(java.io.File jarFile, java.io.File outputDir)
      Extracts the ToMe25s-Java-Utilites.jar from jarFile, if it exists, and puts it into outputDir.
      static void extractThis(java.io.File jarFile, java.io.File outputDir, boolean subDir)
      Extracts the ToMe25s-Java-Utilites.jar from jarFile, if it exists, and puts it into outputDir.

    • Method Detail

      • extractJar

        public static void extractJar(java.io.File jarFile,
                              boolean extractClasses)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Extracts the contents out of the given jar file. This doesn't extract empty directories.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the jar file to extract.
        extractClasses - whether class files should get extracted too.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occurred

      • extractJar

        public static void extractJar(java.io.File jarFile,
                              boolean extractClasses,
                              boolean subDir)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Extracts the contents out of the given jar file. This doesn't extract empty directories.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the jar file to extract.
        extractClasses - whether class files should get extracted too.
        subDir - whether files in a directory inside the jar should get put into a sub directory of outputDir or directly into outputDir.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occurred

      • extractJar

        public static void extractJar(java.io.File jarFile,
                              boolean extractClasses,
                              java.io.File outputDir)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Extracts the contents out of the given jar file. This doesn't extract empty directories.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the jar file to extract.
        extractClasses - whether class files should get extracted too.
        outputDir - the directory to put the extracted files in.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occurred

      • extractJar

                              boolean extractClasses,
                              java.io.File outputDir,
                              boolean subDir)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Extracts the contents out of the given jar file. This doesn't extract empty directories.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the jar file to extract.
        extractClasses - whether class files should get extracted too.
        outputDir - the directory to put the extracted files in.
        subDir - whether files in a directory inside the jar should get put into a sub directory of outputDir or directly into outputDir.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occurred

                       throws java.io.IOException
        Extracts the contents out of the given jar file. This doesn't extract empty directories.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the jar file to extract.
        extract - a predicate that defines what files should get extracted.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occurred

        jarFile - the jar file to extract.
        extract - a predicate that defines what files should get extracted.
        outputDir - the directory to put the extracted files in.

      • extractFileFromJar

        public static void extractFileFromJar(java.io.File jarFile,
                                      java.lang.String fileName)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Extracts the file with the given name from the directory if the name contains the directory names, or all files with that name if it doesn't.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the jar file to extract the file from.
        fileName - the name of the file to extract from the jar.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        fileName - the name of the file to extract from the jar.
        outputDir - the directory to put the extracted files in.

        jarFile - the jar file to extract the file from.

      • extractLibsFromJar

        public static void extractLibsFromJar(java.io.File jarFile)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Extracts all jar files from jarFile, as they are potentially libraries, into the libs directory next to this jar file.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the jar file to extract the files from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • extractLibsFromJar

                                      java.io.File outputDir)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Extracts all jar files from jarFile, as they are potentially libraries, into the libs directory next to this jar file.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the jar file to extract the files from.
        outputDir - the directory to put the extracted files in.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        public static void extractLibsFromJar(java.io.File jarFile,
                                      java.io.File outputDir,
                                      boolean subDir)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Extracts all jar files from jarFile, as they are potentially libraries, into the libs directory next to this jar file.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the jar file to extract the files from.
        outputDir - the directory to put the extracted files in.
        subDir - whether files in a directory inside the jar should get put into a sub directory of outputDir or directly into outputDir.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • extractThis

        public static void extractThis(java.io.File jarFile)
        Extracts the ToMe25s-Java-Utilites.jar from jarFile, if it exists, and puts it into the libs directory next to this jar.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the jar file to extract the file from.

      • extractThis

        public static void extractThis(java.io.File jarFile,
                               java.io.File outputDir)
        Extracts the ToMe25s-Java-Utilites.jar from jarFile, if it exists, and puts it into outputDir.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the jar file to extract the file from.
        outputDir - the directory to put the extracted files in.

      • extractThis

        public static void extractThis(java.io.File jarFile,
                               java.io.File outputDir,
                               boolean subDir)
        Extracts the ToMe25s-Java-Utilites.jar from jarFile, if it exists, and puts it into outputDir.
        Parameters:
        jarFile - the jar file to extract the file from.
        outputDir - the directory to put the extracted files in.
        subDir - whether files in a directory inside the jar should get put into a sub directory of outputDir or directly into outputDir.
